summary: It was supposed to be an easy job for the 5 guys to rob an art museum of $15 million in paintings, but it comes with a body count that continues on the way to Miami to sell.
cast: David Caruso|Linda Fiorentino|John Leguizamo|Ving Rhames|Donnie Wahlberg|Forest Whitaker|Mick Corrigan|Michael Hunter|Matt Giehl|Richard Fullerton|Deacon Dawson|Rebecca Koon|Juliet Poe|Mary Lucy Bivens|James Spruill|Terry Loughlin|Duke Ernsberger|George Jackson|Bill Roberson|Virginia Ernsberger|Kirk Bair|Ronald Boone|Freddy l Robinson
title: Body Count
